snippet: Eliot Spitzer made his late-night television debut on the fifth day of an audacious bid for political redemption as city comptroller.
abstract: Trailside blog; Eliot Spitzer appears on The Tonight Show, making his late-night television debut on fifth day of audacious bid for political redemption; Spitzer appears genial even as host Jay Leno directly addresses prostitution scandal that felled Spitzer.
lead_paragraph: Eliot Spitzer made his late-night television debut on the fifth day of an audacious bid for political redemption as city comptroller.
